original_title: Gia Gan, My Nhan va Gang To
overview: The film is set in the context of Christmas in the past and present. Mr. Gar - an "old man" who has nothing but money and loneliness, has always lived in the recollection of a time past, a wife who is far away ... Then one day, when he decided planning to go on a trip, a series of dramatic, dramatic, interesting stories suddenly appeared! Where does he go? Meet who? What happened?
title: Gia Gan, My Nhan va Gang To
